^[a-zA-Z0-9_.-]*$.description: This is the name of the domain object that you are creating, it can be of any name

domain.description: The host name of the domain

certificate_reference.description: Certificate reference name, if flavor is `aws_alb` then its the ACM ARN certificate reference else `gcp_alb` its the name of the managed certificate that you want facets to create in gcp else `nginx_ingress_controller` its the uploaded k8s certificate referenced as secret
